articles.author: Jacob Rawley, John Bett
articles.title: Star Wars fans thought they spotted 'lightsaber' on Mars in new NASA pictures - Daily Record
articles.description: The space agency releases photos last Wednesday which left some fans of the mega sci-fi franchies baffled.
articles.content:
New pictures released by NASA have caught the eyes of Star Wars fans as it appears to show an object that looks like a lightsaber on the Mars surface.
While the idea of a real-life lightsaber would … [+2023 chars]

articles.author: Elizabeth Howell
articles.title: Happy New Year on Mars! NASA rings in Red Planet year 37 - Space.com
articles.description: Mars years last twice as long as Earth years, and use a different numbering system.
articles.content:
Martian fans will need to break out their New Year champagne a bit early in 2022.
The new year on Mars started today (Dec. 26), NASA said, days after the Perseverance rover set a milestone on the Re… [+2168 chars]
